content: A Chip is a small block of information. It can contain text, an `avatar`, or custom `startContent` and `endContent` (like icons).
Chips can be styled with various `sizes`, `colors`, `radius`, and `variants` (solid, bordered, light, flat, faded, shadow, dot).
A Chip can be made closable or dismissible by providing an `onClose` function. This will render a close button. The close icon can be customized via the `endContent` prop.
The Chip has several stylable slots: `base` (the container), `content`, `dot` (for the dot variant), `avatar`, and `closeButton`.
